name: Dono's Tale
description:
Dono's Tale is ready to be told!

A brand new 16-Bit adventure! Help Dono on his quest to get back his delicious fruit! as he travels through  Aztec ruins, soda factories, and more! you'll be able to smash the baddies with a variety of abilities such as a wing jump, claw slash, thunder dash, and lots more!

     Super cute and colorful graphics!

Dono's Tale will have a wide variety of environments with a familiar art style!

Speed Run Action!

Dono's tale is designed with speed running in mind, with Dono's abilities you can find your way around levels as fast as possible!

Check out what these streamers think of Dono's Tale! Follow us on Kickstarter!
